messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/9/2001 12:01:35 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
tonitoni@... writes:


> If a mother who smoked 'dope' breast fed, would the baby be ingesting
> the drug too.
>
>

My understanding Marriane, is that the baby would be getting very small
amounts. I have never tried it to see. ;)

lovemary
If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself, and then
make a change.
